name: Moon's Daughter
description:
Here is another little game, created with the theme of moonligth and using only 2buttons diferents from the movement.

How to play:

Is a runner platform yo must reach the end of each level before times ends. Be carefull you have two lifes bars, one for your ligth body and other one for your shadow.

When you are under another shadow yours is affected and lose life, if your shadow desapier it will consume your litgh body.

Besides there are specifics areas that block the moonligth, here your ligth body lose life, without the moonligth you will disapier.

Controls

AD - Movility 

W - Jump

Q - Release saved life ligth to your shadow (give extra life to your shadow)

E - Release saved life ligth to your body (give extra life to your ligth body)

Hope you like it and enjoy it x3

SoundTrack is the work for a new comming  song x3
